Articles.Content:
Greetings fellow forum members,

I'm looking for a mod which adds on to the Mk. 2 spaceplane fuselage. To be more specific, I would like a mod which contains a half-long MK. 2 fuel tank.

Does such a mod exist? If so, can you give me a link to it?

PS: If there a popular mod which has this, sorry about my ignorance. XD

I don't know what youre talking about cause I haven't tackled the spaceplane part of the game yet

but you might be looking for this

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-19-1-b9-aerospace-pack-release-2/
